thread.title: Prep Roundup: Lady Buccaneers in quarterfinals
thread.title_full: Prep Roundup: Lady Buccaneers in quarterfinals

author: MDJ staff reports (noreply@mdjonline.com)
title: Prep Roundup: Lady Buccaneers in quarterfinals
text: Prep Roundup: Lady Buccaneers in quarterfinals by MDJ staff reports The Marietta Daily Journal October 21, 2015 12:40 AM | 0 views | 0 | 0 | | Allatoona swept McIntosh 25-20, 25-21, 25-18 at home in the second round of the Class state tournament Tuesday, clinching its first appearance in the state quarterfinals since 2011. Brianna Stopher had four aces and eight digs for the Lady Buccaneers. Katie Cory had 23 digs, while Meara Simmons 28 assists and added nine digs. Jadaiah Daniels had 10 kills and nine blocks, Jaslynn Gwyn had six kills and six blocks and Jada Armstrong had six kills.Allatoona (34-17) had success attacking the middle of the court, where McIntosh was most vulnerable. A seeding meeting will be held today to determine who Allatoona will face in the quarterfinals.FOOTBALLLate Fridayâ–º Johnson Ferry 20, Horizon Christian 7: Mason Meadows passed for 249 yards and accounted for a total of three touchdowns to lead the Saints.Thomas Gilbert had nine catches for 128 yards and a touchdown, while Grant Gay and Jackson Smith paced the defense.Johnson Ferry (4-1) will face the North Georgia Falcons on Friday at Sprayberry.
